thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Weingarten Realty Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.30

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Weingarten Realty Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.30
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Weingarten Realty Investors:
* WEINGARTEN REALTY REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 CORE FFO PER SHARE $0.61 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.30 * SEES 2018 NAREIT FFO PER SHARE $2.27 - $2.33
* SEES 2018 CORE FFO PER SHARE $2.27 - $2.33
* SEES 2018 SAME PROPERTY NOI WITH REDEVELOPMENTS 2.50% - 3.50%
* SEES 2018 SAME PROPERTY NOI WITHOUT REDEVELOPMENTS 2.00% - 3.00%
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.60 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $2.40 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
